name: Bloxorz Roll 3D - Find the Path
description:
The best brain train game!


This is an addictive block rolling style logic skill game.
Test your spacial skills in this block game that gets harder at each progressive level.
Your mission is to move the blocks from the green tiles to the red tiles on each level.
Simple as it sounds,no,each level require logic and brain challenge.

Find the right path to compete all.

Good Luck!
